author: Delaney Chambers
description: In a dramatic video, a sea lion can be seen dragging a young girl into a marina after she and others fed it from a dock.
title: Watch: Why This Sea Lion Dragged a Girl Into the Sea

description: Watch as a sea lion attacks and drags a young girl into the waters at the Steveston Fisherman's Wharf, Richmond B.C. Canada. The girl was rescued by her fami...
title: Killer Sea lion drags girl into Steveston waters

author: Nicola Slawson
description: Girl shaken but physically unharmed after large sea lion grabs her dress and pulls her into the water near Vancouver, Canada
title: Video: California sea lion grabs girl from dock and pulls her underwater
